product.name: Zomboid Steam Gift GLOBAL
product.description: Project Zomboid is an example of a survival-horror, role-playing game, developed by an independent studio known as The Indie Stone.The project was first released as a technological demo in 2011. Since then, PZ is being constantly developed and it regularly receives new content and updates improving the gameplay experience. Project Zomboid allows players to experience the life of one of few survivors, lost in a world full of flesh-eating monsters. The game features a vast, open-world map, a complex crafting system, and many mechanics, characteristic for survival games genre.
product.briefDescription: Project Zomboid is an example of a survival-horror, role-playing game, developed by an independent studio known as The Indie Stone.

product.name: SkyRim
product.description: Cities Skylines is a construction and city management game, is a modern version of the construction game series that gives you a new and exciting feeling when experiencing the game with extremely high realism when starting. hands on construction from nothing to modern skyscrapers.When participating in the game, you have the task of performing the work as an architect and urban manager, you must plan, zoning, and building in the most reasonable way to be able to fully manage the systems from traffic, electricity and water to construction security.
product.briefDescription: Cities Skylines is a construction and city management game, is a modern version of the construction game series that gives you a new and exciting feeling when experiencing the game with extremely high realism when starting. hands on construction from nothing to modern skyscrapers.

product.name: Terraria
product.description: American football in a fantasy world? That's right! Play Blood Bowl 3 and experience all-new and improved content in this legendary series. Lead the most powerful team and grant no mercy!Sometimes the most serious conflicts are best transferred to the pitch. It is what Blood Bowl is all about - an exciting and fun fantasy football game! Choose your race, create a team, manage it, and use every, even the dirtiest, trick to win!
product.briefDescription: American football in a fantasy world? That's right! Play Blood Bowl 3 and experience all-new and improved content in this legendary series. Lead the most powerful team and grant no mercy!

blog.nameBlog: The 25 best games on Xbox Game Pass
blog.description:
Here's what you should play on Xbox and PC
With Microsoft's acquisition of Bethesda early last year, the service added a host of beloved games like Skyrim and Fallout 3. And with Microsoft's recent announcement that it's acquiring Activision Blizzard, Xbox Game Pass's reputation as the best deal in video games is likely to expand even further. It's likely - though unconfirmed - that we could see games like Overwatch, Diablo 3, and possibly even World of Warcraft join the Game Pass line in the next few years.

But the service already has a massive, colorful library of indie and AAA games from across industries. More games launch on Game Pass on release day than ever, and most are also available on Windows PC with PC Game Pass, which is included with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.

With such a large number and variety, it is difficult to separate the wheat from the husk. But we are here to help. Here are the 25 best PC and Xbox Game Pass games that are worth your time.
blog.name: Andrew Shouldice

blog.nameBlog: How to download Tidal and install Tidal on Android/iOS phones
blog.description:
Although there is no shortage of music streaming services. Examples: YouTube Music, Spotify, Apple Music, Tidal – they all work on any smartphone or desktop computer, have millions of songs, support smart speakers, and often come with premium plans lets you play music on demand, without ads. However, most of these music streaming services lack one big aspect – sound quality. And that's where Tidal comes in. Tidal is one of the few music streaming services that allows you to stream “lossless” high-quality uncompressed music.
How to download and install Tidal on Android
Before we start, we need to install the Tidal app on the smartphone. It is possible that you cannot find the 'Tidal' Google Play app. Don't worry, you can easily get the APK to bypass the country restrictions. Just search for “TIDAL APK” on Google or click this link to download APKMirror.

blog.nameBlog: Instructions to play gta 5 online with FiveM are very simple
blog.description:
GTA V Online on the computer has been played by a lot of people in recent times. With an open world game mode and many very realistic simulation features, GTA V Online is chosen by many of you to play with friends. To play GTA V Online, you need the game on Steam or the Epic Store. Besides, you need FiveM to find the right Server. In this article, I will show you how to play GTA V Online with FiveM.

How to play GTA V Online with FiveM
First, you open and log in to Steam to download the FiveM application at: https://fivem.net/ as an exe file. Then you install the app as usual. In addition, you can quickly access it using the link below. To download the FiveM application to play GTA V online quickly.
Install and update FiveM
Step 1: After successful installation, log in to your Cfx.re account. If you do not have an account, select the Register line or if you forget your password, select Send password reset email so that the password is recovered from the email.
Step 2: To register for a Cfx.re account, you need to prepare your email, account name and password in advance.
Step 3: Then, you check your registered email, there will be an email from Cfx.re sent. Click on the link to confirm your account.
Step 4: Then you go back to FiveM app and select Check Verification.Step 4: Then you go back to FiveM app and select Check Verification.
Step 5: Then, the application will report Account Linked that your account has been confirmed. On the main screen to use, select Play to start choosing Sever to play.
Step 6: You can search Sever by country with the national flag image in front, you can play in Vietnam Server for the fastest speed.
Step 7: Once you have selected which server, select Connect to connect to and play.

blog.description:
Online games are very popular, but there are still many good offline games for PC to choose from.

In terms of gaming flexibility, no other platform can match the PC. It's a platform that has a lot of advantages for those who can get past the often daunting price point. As a bonus, while consoles require a monthly subscription fee to play games online, the majority of PC games are free. Despite that, many people enjoy playing games offline.

One can spend hundreds of hours playing an offline PC game and have no regrets. Here are the best offline PC games to play right now.

blog.nameBlog: Blockbuster Battlefield 1 and Battlefield 5 are free on PC through Prime Gaming
blog.description:
Starting from July 21 to August 4, gamers who subscribe to the Amazon Prime Gaming service will receive a free version of Battlefield 1 for PC. And yet, in 2 months from August 2, 2021 to October 1, 2021, they will also receive Battlefield 5 PC version. Prime Gaming is a subscription service under Amazon Prime that provides subscribers to Twitch, exclusive game content, and especially free game titles on a regular basis.

How to get Battlefield 1 and Battlefield 5 for free
Visit the Amazon Prime Gaming homepage at: https://gaming.amazon.com/intro
Click the Try Prime button and log in to an existing account or sign up for a new account.
After logging in, you will be asked to confirm details including email, payment method, etc.
Click the “Start your free trial – pay later” button
Once you are an Amazon Prime Gaming member, visit the following link to receive Battlefield 1 https://gaming.amazon.com/loot/battlefield1
Free Battlefield 5: https://gaming.amazon.com/loot/battlefieldv

blog.description:
They are also not limited to one genre. When it comes to the best games, you've got quite a selection of titles, from the best MMOs or MOBAs and beautiful open world games in which you can do just about anything, even games. Best Co-Op game to play with friends.
Death Stranding is attracting a lot of attention not only to the big names associated with it, but incidentally including Mads Mikkelsen and Léa Seydoux. As porter Sam Bridges, you bravely cross an apocalyptic America to deliver valuable goods, navigating these lands plagued by terrorists, bandits, and invisible creatures called Beached Things. This award-winning action game is also a treat for all the senses, thanks to its wonderful storyline, possibly reminiscent of the current pandemic, good gameplay, exciting missions and sounds. and impressive images.
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is aging like fine wine. Even a few years after its release, it's still one of the most impressive open-world games to ever exist - blending the scale of Skyrim with the incredible depth of Grand Theft Auto V. It's a game that controls fun, that's why it's nominated for the top spot on the list of the best games of 2020. It's amazing, beautiful, and it will immerse you - in a good way - The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is not only the best PC game of 2020, it is also one of the best open world games on PC, one of the best games of all time.
blog.name: Genre Shouldice
